fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run test 1069 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
Text area too small, cannot scroll

Expected Result:
Should be able to display all the text in the area and allow it to scroll

iOS:
utilizes the entire window space even when not needed, but allows scrolling for the longer text
fields.summary: Android: Size text area is not enlarging the area to display all the text, and is not scrollable
